titles.title: Middle Income Senior Tax Relief Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to increase the income threshold amounts at which 85 percent of social security benefits become includible in gross income.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

term.name: Old age, survivors and disability insurance

bill.summary: 9/30/1993--Introduced. Middle Income Senior Tax Relief Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to increase the income threshold amounts at which 85 percent of social security benefits become includable in gross income.
